transcript: the win- dows, Anna Mikhdylovna, having turned with words of comfort to her companion, realized that he was asleep in his corner and woke him up. Rousing himself, Pierre followed Anna Mikhaylovna out of the carriage, and only then began to think of the interview with his dying father which awaited him. He noticed that they had not come to the front entrance but to the backdoor. While he was getting down from the carriage steps two men, who looked like tradespeople, ran hurriedly from the entr
